@notice Constructor
 @param _uniRouterAddress Address of Uniswap style router

@notice Sends the specified earnings amount (in USD) as revenue share to ZOR stakers
 @param _amount The amount of USD to share as revenue with ZOR stakers
@notice Converts USD to want token without token transfer
@notice Converts Want token to USD without token transfer

returns.positionVal: Position value, in units of Want token

distributeAndReinvestEarnings(uint256,ui.details: To be run by Vault's earn() func after earnings have been unfarmed

params._amount: Amount of Want token to distribute

returns.wantRemaining: Remaining Want token after distribution (will be sent back to sender)
returns.xChainBuybackAmt: Amount of Want token reserved for cross chain buyback, if applicable
returns.xChainRevShareAmt: Amount of Want token reserved for cross chain revshare, if applicable

params._amountUSD: The USD quantity to exchange (must already be deposited)

returns.wantObtained: Amount of Want token obtained and transferred to sender

params._amount: The Want token quantity to exchange (must be deposited beforehand)
params._maxMarketMovementAllowed: The max slippage allowed for swaps. 1000 = 0 %, 995 = 0.5%, etc.

returns.usdObtained: Amount of USD token obtained and transferred to sender

exitPool(uint256,uint256,address,(addres.details: NOTE: Requires caller to approve want token spending

params._amountLP: The amount of LP (Want) tokens to remove
params._maxMarketMovementAllowed: The max slippage allowed for swaps. 1000 = 0 %, 995 = 0.5%, etc.
params._recipient: The recipient of the underlying tokens at pool exit

joinPool(address,address,uint256,uint256.details: NOTE: Requires spending approval by caller

params._maxMarketMovementAllowed: The max slippage allowed for swaps. 1000 = 0 %, 995 = 0.5%, etc.
params._recipient: The recipient of the LP token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._path: The swap path to be reversed

safeSwap((uint256,uint256,uint256,addres.details: NOTE: Caller must approve tokens for spending beforehand

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns.accumulatedProfit: Amount of unrealized profit accumulated on the vault (not accounting for past harvests)

currentWantEquity(address).notice: Measures the current (unrealized) position value (measured in Want token) of the provided vault

distributeAndReinvestEarnings(uint256,ui.notice: Distributes earnings (in the form of Want token) and reinvests remainder into Want token

exchangeUSDForWantToken(uint256,uint256).notice: Performs necessary operations to convert USD into Want token

exchangeWantTokenForUSD(uint256,uint256).notice: Converts Want token back into USD to be ready for withdrawal and transfers to sender

exitPool(uint256,uint256,address,(addres.notice: Removes liquidity from a pool and sends tokens back to this address

joinPool(address,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Adds liquidity to the pool of this contract

reversePath(address[]).notice: Gets the swap path in the opposite direction of a trade

safeSwap((uint256,uint256,uint256,addres.notice: Safely swaps tokens using the most suitable protocol based on token

unrealizedProfits(address).notice: Calculates accumulated unrealized profits on a vault
